DOC.brief_summary: Application health information technology able solve lot problem medical management , effective action achieve purpose medical care . The `` Personal Health Record '' ( PHR ) , patient , access update health record share health information new healthcare provider avoid duplication clinic procedure , reduce medical cost time , make appointment online , track vaccination , check drug allergy , master health-related information exercise , diet condition , time constraint hospital clinic . In future , PHR expect reduce medical error , reduce cost , effective use medical resource . Purpose study understand impact staff 's attitude intention use PHR , explore medical record personal health awareness intention use relevant factor , research result reference government authority medical institution order promote personal health record system Taiwan . In study , include medical staff three hospital Taipei , Technology Acceptance Model ( TAM model ) base structured questionnaire use , questionnaire test validity reliability . The electronic questionnaire use , apply software SPSS Amos17.0 descriptive inferential statistical analysis .
DOC.brief_title: The Factors Affecting Intentions Medical Staff Use Personal Health Record Northern Hospitals Taiwan
DOC.criteria: Health care provider Volunteer Subject Be able understand content questionnaire None
